question: Is MEDI2228 a bispecific antibody?
ideal_answer: No, MEDI2228 is an antibody drug conjugate (ADC).

snippets.text: We here delineated the molecular and cellular mechanisms underlying novel immunomodulatory effects triggered by BCMA pyrrolobenzodiazepine (PBD) antibody drug conjugate (ADC) MEDI2228 which can augment efficacy of these immunotherapies.
